name: 毛紹綱
objective: 中文內容概述: 本課程著重通訊工程中多種與電磁波相關元件之分析與設計，包括各式通訊高頻組件分析、輻射特性與導波特性研究、以及其他新型微波與毫米波頻段之電路與天線
schedule:
課程綱要：
1. Review of EM and Transmission Line Theories
2. Microwave Detector and Rectifier
3. Microwave Network Analysis
4. Coupling effect in Microwave Resonator
5. Filters
6. Characteristics of Planar Antenna Design
7. Final Report and Discussion
materials:
1. 自編講義
2. J. R. Smith, Modern Communication Circuits, 2nd ed., McGraw-Hill, 1998.
3. D. M. Pozar, Microwave Engineering, 2nd ed., John Wiley & Sons, 1998.
4. related papers and reports.
